meanings.definition: The state or quality of being creamy.
meanings.sent1: The creaminess of the mashed potatoes made them irresistible.
meanings.sent2: I love the creaminess of the ice cream on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The creaminess of the cake frosting made it look like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a creaminess that enveloped the room like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The creaminess of the lotion left my skin feeling soft and smooth.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a smooth, rich texture like cream.
meanings.sent1: The creaminess of the chocolate melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The creaminess of the sauce added depth to the pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: The creaminess of the paint made the walls look like they were made of silk.
meanings.sent4: The creaminess of her voice was like a melody floating in the air.
meanings.sent5: The creaminess of the fabric made the dress feel luxurious against my skin.
